hero.title: About RK Enterprise
hero.subtitle: Excellence in Manufacturing Door Parts Since 2016
hero.description: RK Enterprise has been a leading manufacturer of precision door parts and window components for over 7 years. We combine innovative technology with expert craftsmanship to deliver high-quality customized solutions for our clients.

meta.title: RK Enterprise - Manufacturing Excellence Since 2016
meta.description: Specialized manufacturer of door parts and window components with 7 years of industry experience, delivering precision and customized solutions.

companyJourney.title: Our Journey
companyJourney.subtitle: Seven years of growth, innovation, and manufacturing excellence

items.content: RK Enterprise is a specialized manufacturer of connecting door parts and windows, established in 2016. We provide precision manufacturing solutions with advanced laser writing and customization technologies, serving diverse industrial clients with high-quality, tailored products.
